product_name: Trails Illustrated Denali National Park and Preserve Trail Map
long_description: This colorful Trails Illustrated folded map offers detailed coverage of Alaska's Denali National Park. Provides valuable wilderness tips and Leave No Trace guidelines, along with updated trails, trailheads, points of interest, campgrounds and much more. Printed on waterproof, tear-resistant material with a plastic coating that offers the durability needed for outdoor use. Includes selected waypoints in both lat./lon. and UTM coordinate systems as well as GPS-compatible UTM grid lines for easy navigation. Measures 9.25 x 4.25 in. folded and 37.75 x 25.5 in. fully opened; scale of 1:225,000. National Geographic Maps; copyright 1990 (revised 2007).
short_description: This colorful Trails Illustrated folded map offers detailed coverage of Alaska's Denali National Park.
